entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
